faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our pricing
faq.a1: No, all our pricing is transparent. No hidden fees.
faq.a2: Yes, you can change plans anytime from your client area.
faq.a3: Yes, all SEPA transfers are free on all our plans.
faq.a4: You can close your account anytime without fees.

help.title: Help Center
help.subtitle: Quickly find answers to your questions
help.faqSubtitle: The most common questions from our customers
help.contactSubtitle: Our support team is here to help you

noResults.title: No questions found
noResults.description: Try changing your search criteria or contact our support.

accountOpening.question: How to open a bank account?
accountOpening.answer: To open an account, go to our website and click "Open an account". You'll need to provide your personal information, an ID document, and proof of address. The process usually takes 24-48h.

transfer.question: How to make a transfer?
transfer.answer: Log in to your client area, go to the "Transfers" section and follow the steps. You'll need the beneficiary's IBAN. SEPA transfers are usually processed within 24h.

cardBlocked.question: My card was blocked, what should I do?
cardBlocked.answer: If your card is blocked, contact our customer service immediately at 01 23 45 67 89. We can unblock it or send you a new one if needed.

passwordChange.question: How to change my password?
passwordChange.answer: Go to "Settings" > "Security" > "Change password". You'll need to enter your current password and the new password twice.

bankingFees.question: What are the banking fees?
bankingFees.answer: Our fees vary depending on the account type. Check our pricing table in the "Pricing" section or contact our customer service for more details.

twoFactor.question: How to enable two-factor authentication?
twoFactor.answer: In "Settings" > "Security", you can enable two-factor authentication. You'll receive an SMS code at each login.

ibanChange.question: Has my IBAN changed?
ibanChange.answer: No, your IBAN remains the same unless you change accounts. You can view it in the IBAN section of your client area.

downloadStatements.question: How to download my bank statements?
downloadStatements.answer: Go to History > select the period > click Download. You can choose PDF or CSV format.

faq1.question: How to open a bank account?
faq1.answer: To open an account, go to our website and click "Open an account". You'll need to provide your personal information, an ID document, and proof of address. The process usually takes 24-48h.

faq2.answer: Log in to your client area, go to the "Transfers" section and follow the steps. You'll need the beneficiary's IBAN. SEPA transfers are usually processed within 24h.

faq3.answer: If your card is blocked, contact our customer service immediately at 01 23 45 67 89. We can unblock it or send you a new one if needed.

faq4.answer: Go to "Settings" > "Security" > "Change password". You'll need to enter your current password and the new password twice.

protection.description: Protect your transactions with our advanced fraud insurance.

referral.description: Refer a friend and get €50 each. Applicable conditions.

documents.title: My Documents
documents.subtitle: Access all your banking documents securely

accountContract.title: Bank account contract
accountContract.description: General terms of your AmCbunq account
accountContract.detailedDescription: This contract defines the general terms for opening and using your AmCbunq bank account. It includes the rights and obligations of each party, account operating conditions, applicable fees, and termination procedures.
accountContract.usage: Consult this document to understand your rights and obligations as an account holder. It's important to keep it as it may be required for administrative procedures or in case of dispute.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy policy
privacyPolicy.description: How we protect your personal data
privacyPolicy.detailedDescription: This policy details how AmCbunq collects, uses, stores and protects your personal data in accordance with GDPR. It explains your data protection rights and how to exercise them.
privacyPolicy.usage: Read this policy carefully to understand how your data is processed. You can exercise your rights (access, rectification, deletion) by contacting our data protection officer.

termsOfService.title: Terms of service
termsOfService.description: Rules for using our banking services
termsOfService.detailedDescription: These terms govern the use of all our online, mobile and physical banking services. They cover security rules, usage limits, responsibilities and sanctions in case of non-compliance.
termsOfService.usage: Accept these terms to use our services. They may be modified with 30 days notice. In case of modification, you'll be notified by email and in your client area.

legalNotice.title: Legal notice
legalNotice.detailedDescription: This notice contains mandatory legal information about AmCbunq: institution identity, banking authorizations, supervision, deposit guarantees, and contact details of supervisory authorities.
legalNotice.usage: Consult this notice to verify the legality of our activities and know your guarantees. This information is important for your security and our service compliance.

cardContract.title: Bank card contract
cardContract.description: Specific terms for your bank card
cardContract.detailedDescription: This contract details the issuance and usage conditions of your bank card: limits, fees, insurance, responsibilities in case of loss or theft, and dispute procedures.
cardContract.usage: Keep this document with your card. It contains essential information about your rights and obligations, especially in case of fraud or transaction dispute.

securityPolicy.title: Security policy
securityPolicy.description: Security measures to protect your account
securityPolicy.detailedDescription: This policy details the security measures implemented by AmCbunq to protect your account and data: multi-factor authentication, transaction monitoring, data encryption, and incident procedures.
securityPolicy.usage: Follow these recommendations to secure your account. In case of suspected compromise, contact our security service immediately.
